section.description: The Color Picker allows you to select very subtle colors and to create colors with RGB (Red, Green, Blue) or HLS (Hue, Saturation, Luminance) definitions.

step.description: Optionally, select a color from the System palette.
Optionally, select a color from the Custom palette.

case.description: 1. Enter a number from 0 to 255 in each of the H, L, S fields. The Hex field shows you the value that will be inserted into the HTML file.
2. Enter a number from 0 to 255 in each of the R, G, B fields. The Hex field shows you the value that will be inserted into the HTML file.
3. Optionally, click Add To Custom palette. This will add the new color to the Custom Color list.

step.description: Click OK to apply the color or Cancel to discard your inputs.
